issue_title: [Perf] save 方法对大型 todo 列表使用 indent=2 会产生不必要的文件体积膨胀
summary: Optimized TodoStorage.save() to use compact JSON serialization for large todo lists (>=100 items) while maintaining pretty format for smaller lists (<100 items) for readability.
implementation_approach: Dynamic indent selection based on list size threshold (100 items)
risks: None identified - JSON output remains semantically identical
limitations: Threshold is fixed at 100 items; not configurable
